name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A promotional montage featuring clips of song covers by AZKi and Tokino Sora, along with information about recent releases.
A long segment displaying a scrolling list of crowdfunding supporters for the live event, accompanied by the full version of the song 'Futurity Step'.

subtitles.original: 「トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ」(Cover)
subtitles.english: "Tokyo Shandy Rendezvous" (Cover)

subtitles.original: ...運命して見せる
subtitles.english: ...I'll show you it's destiny.

subtitles.original: 「Sincerely」(Cover)
subtitles.english: "Sincerely" (Cover)

subtitles.original: 底も... 傷も... きっとも... 叶えたいと誓ったのに
subtitles.english: Even the bottom... even the pain... surely... even though I swore I wanted it to come true...

subtitles.original: 2024年3月6日(水) Release Mini Album STAR STAR★T
subtitles.english: Released on Wednesday, March 6, 2024: Mini Album "STAR STAR★T"

subtitles.original: 広い世界で　見つめ合った瞬間　確かに感じたんだ
subtitles.english: In this wide world, the moment our eyes met, I certainly felt it.

subtitles.original: 歌ってみた「可愛くてごめん」
subtitles.english: Song Cover: "Kawaikute Gomen"

subtitles.original: 探していた君が
subtitles.english: It's you, the one I've been searching for.

subtitles.original: 2023.12.20 Release SorAZ メジャーデビューアルバム Futurity Step
subtitles.english: Released on December 20, 2023: SorAZ Major Debut Album "Futurity Step"

subtitles.original: Major Debut Live「First Gravity」 CD物販限定特典
subtitles.english: Major Debut Live "First Gravity" CD Merchandise Exclusive Bonus

subtitles.original: エルタマ 当日差し入れ企画 参加者様 一覧
subtitles.english: Eltama Day-of Catering Project Participant List

subtitles.original: 振り切り出したこの靴が
subtitles.english: These shoes that have started to shake off everything

subtitles.original: 響き出したあの音が
subtitles.english: That sound that has started to resonate

subtitles.original: 今なら特別に輝いて
subtitles.english: Now, it's shining especially bright

subtitles.original: 理屈はもういらないね
subtitles.english: Logic is no longer needed

subtitles.original: 拘束も越えられる
subtitles.english: Even constraints can be overcome

subtitles.original: この目で見つめて何度でも
subtitles.english: With these eyes, looking on again and again

subtitles.original: マグネット またねと手を振ればほら
subtitles.english: Magnet, if we wave our hands saying "see you again," look

subtitles.original: 繋がってるから星座のように
subtitles.english: We're connected, like a constellation

subtitles.original: マグネット またきっとどんな場所でも
subtitles.english: Magnet, surely again, no matter where we are

subtitles.original: 惹かれあう定めの方へ
subtitles.english: Towards the destiny that draws us together

subtitles.original: そう、二人の声が
subtitles.english: So, our two voices...

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださったそらとも・開拓者の皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To all Soratomo and Pioneers who sent catering, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 言い続けた未来のためばかり
subtitles.english: Always for the sake of the future I kept talking about

subtitles.original: 今という時間費やすけれど
subtitles.english: Even though I spend the time that is "now"

subtitles.original: 降り積もっていく感情とここにいたら
subtitles.english: If I'm here with these accumulating emotions

subtitles.original: 思いして弾けた心がもう一度動き出すよ
subtitles.english: My heart that burst with thought will start moving once more

subtitles.original: 震えだした鼓動
subtitles.english: My heartbeat has started to tremble

subtitles.original: 胸の痛みも涙もわけもすべて
subtitles.english: The pain in my chest, the tears, the reasons, everything

subtitles.original: 強さに変えて
subtitles.english: Turning it all into strength

subtitles.original: 飲み込んだ想い青い空に飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Send those swallowed emotions into the blue sky

subtitles.original: 繋がらぬメロディ流れる星に変わってく
subtitles.english: The disconnected melody turns into a shooting star

subtitles.original: 君のために歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing for your sake

subtitles.original: 君に届くようにと
subtitles.english: So that it reaches you

subtitles.original: 輝きは世界中を越えて
subtitles.english: The brilliance crosses the whole world

subtitles.original: 確かにここで重ねあった鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeats we layered together here for certain

subtitles.original: 触れ合う音が光になって
subtitles.english: The sounds touching each other turn into light

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐこの一瞬が
subtitles.english: This moment pouring down

subtitles.original: 永遠なぞ
subtitles.english: Like an eternity

subtitles.original: 煌めいては色づいてゆく君と描いた世界
subtitles.english: It's sparkling and gaining color, the world I drew with you

subtitles.original: いつだって明日は来るだなんて
subtitles.english: Saying that tomorrow will always come

subtitles.original: 言って欲しくもない朝もあるけど
subtitles.english: There are mornings I don't even want to hear that

subtitles.original: 宵闇に消えてもこのまま隠れられなくて
subtitles.english: Even if I disappear in the dusk, I can't stay hidden like this

subtitles.original: 静寂を断ち切って叫びたい声を歌に変え
subtitles.english: Cutting through the silence, I'll turn the voice that wants to shout into a song

subtitles.original: いつもそこにある
subtitles.english: It's always there

subtitles.original: 隔て阻む壁も壊して進め
subtitles.english: Break down the walls that divide and obstruct us, and move forward

subtitles.original: 胸の奥にある
subtitles.english: It's deep in my heart

subtitles.original: 忘れたフリで誤魔化し切れない傷も
subtitles.english: Even the wounds I can't fully hide by pretending to forget

subtitles.original: 乗り越えてゆく
subtitles.english: I will overcome them

subtitles.original: 絡まった想い音に変えて飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Turn those tangled emotions into sound and send them flying

subtitles.original: 生まれるメロディ激しく鼓動奏で合う
subtitles.english: The emerging melody and the intense heartbeat play together

subtitles.original: 言葉だけじゃ足りない
subtitles.english: Words alone are not enough

subtitles.original: 歌じゃなくちゃ届かない
subtitles.english: If it's not a song, it won't reach

subtitles.original: 情熱が胸を熱くさせて
subtitles.english: Let passion make my chest feel hot

subtitles.original: 確かにここで分かりあえた鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeats that understood each other here for certain

subtitles.original: 時の流れを逆らうように開かれた
subtitles.english: Opened up as if defying the flow of time

subtitles.original: 何度だって歌うから君の場所が
subtitles.english: I'll sing again and again so that your place

subtitles.original: いつも光に包まれるように
subtitles.english: Will always be wrapped in light

subtitles.original: すべてが崩れ出しそうで
subtitles.english: When everything seems about to crumble

subtitles.original: どこにも歩き出せない時は
subtitles.english: And I can't step out anywhere

subtitles.original: 送り続けるこの鼓動
subtitles.english: I'll keep sending this heartbeat

subtitles.original: 聞こえる場所探し踏み出すよ
subtitles.english: Searching for a place where it can be heard, I'll step out

subtitles.original: 遠くの星がささやくように
subtitles.english: Like a distant star whispering...
